name: Woman
line: Thanks.

name: Hopper
line: Hands up. Hands up! Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa. Forgot all the cameras, bub? Look, Dr. Brenner asked for me specifically. Okay? How else do you think I got in here? What's your name again? It's Jim Hopper. Chief Jim Hopper.

name: Man on radio
line: Come again?

name: Lonnie
line: Drink. It'll calm your nerves. Help you think straight, yeah? I know. I know.

name: Joyce
line: I don't know what to do. This whole time... I... I could... I could feel him. He was... He was so close. He was... he was right there. I knew he was alive. Our hands... our hands were almost touching. Now it's like I... uh... God, it's like I can't feel him anymore. Don't look at me like that. Like how everybody is looking at me. Like I'm out of my damn mind.

name: Lonnie
line: Like what? Hey. You're not gonna like this, but I think you need to seriously consider the possibility that all this... It's in your head. You remember your Aunt Darlene? No, this is not that. I mean, when something like this happens, your mind makes up stuff for you to cope, you know? I mean, Jesus, there's a funeral tomorrow for our little boy and you're saying his body is fake.

name: Joyce
line: He's in the wall. I mean, how do you explain that? It just doesn't make sense. It doesn't. They can't help. Well, they can't help. Joyce, you just told me... that Will is gone. What else is there to do?

name: Hopper
line: Will? Will? Will? Will?

name: Mike
line: What was Will saying? Like home... Like home... but dark? Like home. Like his house? Or maybe like Hawkins. Upside down. What'd she say? Upside down. When El showed us where Will was, she flipped the board over, remember? Upside down. Dark. Empty. Guys, come on, think about it. When El took us to find Will, she took us to his house, right? But what if he was there? What if we just couldn't see him? What if he was on the other side? What if this is Hawkins and... this is where Will is? The Upside Down.

name: Lucas
line: And empty. Empty and cold. Wait, did he say cold? I don't know. The stupid radio kept going in and out.

name: Mike
line: It's like riddles in the dark.

name: Lucas
line: What?

name: Mike
line: Do you understand what he's talking about? Yeah. And he wasn't there.

name: Lucas
line: But what if he was there?

name: Mike
line: What if he was on the other side?

name: Dustin
line: The Vale of Shadows is a dimension that is a dark reflection or echo of our world. It is a place of decay and death. A plane out of phase. A place of monsters. It is right next to you, and you don't even see it.

name: Mike
line: An alternate dimension.

name: Lucas
line: But... how... how do we get there?

name: Dustin
line: You cast Shadow Walk.

name: Mike
line: In real life, dummy.

name: Dustin
line: We can't shadow walk, but... maybe she can.

name: Mike
line: Do you know how we get there? To the Upside Down?

name: Hopper
line: Hey! Hey! Hey! I see him! Hey! Stop!

name: Lonnie
line: Yeah, I'm here as long as you need me, okay? How are you holding up?

name: Jonathan
line: What happened? That thing you saw before, did it come back? Can we talk? Alone? You need to leave. Yeah. Maybe he was. This isn't some kind of joke. You come in here and you start feeding into her hallucinations or whatever the hell you want to call it, you're gonna push her right over the edge. You hear me? Thank God you're here. Do me a favor. At the funeral tomorrow, just behave. If not for me, for your mother.

name: Lonnie
line: Look, I know you're upset. We all are. But you need to listen to me. Your mother is sick. Really sick. Yeah, well, you being here, you're just making things worse, like always. I'm on your side. I'm here to help. I'm gonna make things better around here for all of us.

name: Joyce
line: Don't worry about that. Jonathan, that's enough.

name: Karen
line: Good. Looks good. You look nice, sweetie. You can borrow my black heels if you want. The ones you wore to Cathy's birthday.

name: Nancy
line: Ah! Dad, you're... you're choking me. I'm fine. Thanks.

name: Pastor Charles
line: Fear not, for I am with you. Be not dismayed, for I am your God. I will strengthen you. Yes, I will help you. I will uphold you with my righteous right hand. It's times like these that our faith is challenged. How, if He is truly benevolent... could God take from us someone so young, so innocent? It would be easy to turn away from God... but we must remember that nothing, not even tragedy, can separate us from His love. We are here today to find comfort in the truth of scripture, and to surround Will and his family...

name: Karen
line: I'm so, so sorry. Yeah, if there's anything we can do...

name: Joyce
line: Oh, thank you so much for coming. I appreciate it. Thank you so much. Take care, all right? Thanks. Thanks for coming out.

name: Dustin
line: I see Will the Wise is back. What's that shooting out of his cane? Fireballs. I couldn't find the red crayon, so that's why it's green. Most of the time, yeah, totally. But... sometimes the bad guys are smart, too. You know?

name: Nancy
line: Oh, well... if he's so wise, why does he need fireballs? Why can't he just, you know, outsmart the bad guys? So he needs the fireballs?

name: Dustin
line: Yeah. Well, yeah, to burn them to a crisp.

name: Nancy
line: All right. Well, I don't know who's been raising you, but I'm gonna get you some new crayons because it looks like he's shooting cabbages.

name: Lucas
line: Will! Will, it's us! Are you there? Why can't he hear us?

name: Dustin
line: Can you hear us? We're here!

name: Will
line: Hello? Mom? Mom, it's coming!

name: Mike
line: I don't know! She was there.

name: Jonathan
line: This is where we know for sure it's been, right? And that's the woods where they found Will's bike and... that's my house. It's all so close.

name: Nancy
line: So, that's... Steve's house.

name: Jonathan
line: Yeah. Exactly. I mean, it's all within a mile or something. Whatever this thing is, it's... it's not traveling far.

name: Nancy
line: You want to go out there.

name: Jonathan
line: We might not find anything.

name: Nancy
line: I found something. And if we do see it... then what?

name: Jonathan
line: We kill it.

name: Nancy
line: What are you doing?

name: Jonathan
line: Just give me a second.

name: Nancy
line: Are you serious? What? You want to find this thing and take another photo? Yell at it?

name: Jonathan
line: This is a terrible idea.

name: Nancy
line: Yeah, well, it's the best we've got. What? You can tell someone, but they're not gonna believe you. You know that.

name: Jonathan
line: Your mom would.

name: Nancy
line: She's been through enough. She deserves to know.

name: Jonathan
line: Yeah, and I'll tell her... when this thing is dead.

name: Repairman
line: Let's take a look, huh? That right?

name: Dustin
line: I don't know what in the world caused it. Mr. Clarke says he's never seen anything like it. Yeah, he runs the AV Club. Apparently, some of the less athletic types go nuts for this stuff.

name: Mike
line: Mr. Clarke? We were wondering if you had time to talk? We have some questions.

name: Dustin
line: A lot of questions.

name: Mike
line: So, you know how in Cosmos, Carl Sagan talks about other dimensions? Like, beyond our world?

name: Mr. Clarke
line: Yeah, sure. Theoretically.

name: Mike
line: Right, theoretically. So, theoretically, how do we travel there?

name: Mr. Clarke
line: You guys have been thinking about Hugh Everett's Many-Worlds Interpretation, haven't you? Well, basically, there are parallel universes. Just like our world, but just infinite variations of it. Which means there's a world out there where none of this tragic stuff ever happened.

name: Dustin
line: Yeah, that's not what we're talking about.

name: Mr. Clarke
line: Oh.

name: Mike
line: We were thinking of more of an evil dimension, like the Vale of Shadows. You know the Vale of Shadows?

name: Mr. Clarke
line: An echo of the Material Plane, where necrotic and shadow magic... If that did exist, a place like the Vale of Shadows, how would we travel there?

name: Mike
line: Theoretically.

name: Mr. Clarke
line: Well... Picture... an acrobat... standing on a tightrope. Now, the tightrope is our dimension. And our dimension has rules. You can move forwards, or backwards. But, what if... right next to our acrobat, there is a flea? Now, the flea can also travel back and forth, just like the acrobat. Here's where things get really interesting. The flea can also travel this way... along the side of the rope. He can even go... underneath the rope.

name: Mike
line: Upside down.

name: Lucas
line: Upside down.

name: Dustin
line: Upside down.

name: Mr. Clarke
line: Exactly. But we're not the flea, we're the acrobat. In this metaphor, yes, we're the acrobat.

name: Mike
line: So we can't go upside down?

name: Mr. Clarke
line: No.

name: Lucas
line: Well, is there any way for the acrobat to get to the Upside Down?

name: Mr. Clarke
line: Well... you'd have to create a massive amount of energy. More than humans are currently capable of creating, mind you, to open up some kind of tear in time and space, and then... you create a doorway.

name: Mike
line: Like a gate?

name: Mr. Clarke
line: Sure. Like a gate. But again, this is all...

name: Dustin
line: Theoretical.

name: Mike
line: But... but what if this gate already existed?

name: Mr. Clarke
line: Well, if it did, I... I think we'd know. It would disrupt gravity, the magnetic field, our environment. Heck, it might even swallow us up whole. Science is neat. But I'm afraid it's not very forgiving.

name: Powell
line: Jesus, Chief. You all right? We tried calling, but...

name: Hopper
line: What are you doing here? Yeah, the phone's dead.

name: Powell
line: Hey, so Bev Mooney came in this morning all upset. Said that Dale and Henry went hunting yesterday... and they didn't come back home. She thought they were on another binger, but she's not so sure now. I think this whole Will Byers thing has everybody on edge.

name: Hopper
line: Where was this?

name: Powell
line: It was at the station.

name: Hopper
line: No, no. Where did Henry and Dale go hunting?

name: Powell
line: Oh. Uh, out near Kerley.

name: Hopper
line: Mirkwood. Okay. You go back to the station. I'll take care of this, all right? Yeah, leave it.

name: Powell
line: Are you sure? Oh, hey. Uh, they found Barbara's car.

name: Hopper
line: What?

name: Powell
line: Barbara Holland's car. Seems she ran away after all. Staties found it late last night at a bus station. Funny, right? They keep doing our job for us.

name: Hopper
line: Yeah. It's funny.

name: Callahan
line: Is he off his meds again?

name: Powell
line: He's been spending too much time with Joyce Byers. That's what I think.

name: Joyce
line: What are you doing? I told you not to take these down.

name: Lonnie
line: What does it look like I'm doing? You want to freeze to death all winter? They were in the way, babe. How long are you gonna keep those up? I mean, really? You know, it's a shame what they've done to this family.

name: Joyce
line: What?

name: Lonnie
line: The Sattler Company. I went to the quarry on the way over here. I just wanted to look around, you know? Couldn't believe it. I just couldn't believe it. No warning signs, no fence, no nothing. Ought to be held accountable if you ask me.

name: Mike
line: It would take a lot of energy to build a gate like this. But that's got to be what happened. Otherwise, how'd Will get there, right?

name: Dustin
line: Right.

name: Mike
line: What we want to know is, do you know where the gate is?

name: Dustin
line: Then how do you know about the Upside Down?

name: Mike
line: Dustin, what are you doing? Dustin? Dustin!

name: Lucas
line: Dustin!

name: Dustin
line: I... I need to see your compasses. Your compasses. All of your compasses, right now! What's exciting about this? Well, they're all facing north, right? Well, that's not true north.

name: Lucas
line: Yeah, so? What do you mean?

name: Dustin
line: I mean exactly what I just said. That's not true north. Are you both seriously this dense? The sun rises in the east, and it sets in the west. Right? Which means that's true north.

name: Mike
line: So what you're saying is the compasses are broken.

name: Dustin
line: Do you even understand how a compass works? Do you see a battery pack on this? No, you don't. Because it doesn't need one. The needle's naturally drawn to the Earth's magnetic North Pole.

name: Lucas
line: So what's wrong with them?

name: Dustin
line: Well, that's what I couldn't figure out, but then I remembered. You can change the direction of a compass with a magnet. If there's the presence of a more powerful magnetic field, the needle deflects to that power. And then I remembered what Mr. Clarke said. The gate would have so much power... It could disrupt the electromagnetic field.

name: Mike
line: Exactly.

name: Dustin
line: Meaning, if we follow the compasses' north... They should lead us to the gate.

name: Jonathan
line: What are you doing here?

name: Nancy
line: Nothing. I hope that's not meant for me.

name: Jonathan
line: What? No. Oh, no, I was just... thinking about joining softball.

name: Nancy
line: Oh. Okay.

name: Jonathan
line: Well, uh... listen, I'm really sorry. I mean, even before you threatened me with the baseball bat. I panicked and... I mean, I was a total dick.

name: Nancy
line: Yeah, you were.

name: Jonathan
line: Did you get in trouble with your parents?

name: Nancy
line: Totally, but... you know, who cares? Screw 'em.

name: Jonathan
line: Any news about Barbara? Parents heard from her? Or...

name: Nancy
line: No.

name: Jonathan
line: Hey, listen. Why don't we, uh, why don't we catch a movie tonight, you know? Just kinda pretend everything's normal for a few hours. All The Right Moves is still playing. You know, with your lover boy from Risky Business?

name: Nancy
line: Yeah, I know.

name: Jonathan
line: You know, Carol thinks I actually kinda look like him. What do you think? Huh?

name: Nancy
line: I just, I... I don't think I can. I've been really busy with this whole funeral thing and... with my brother. It's been really hard on him.

name: Jonathan
line: Yeah, sure. Sure, yeah, yeah.

name: Nancy
line: So... I should go. Sorry. I'll call you later. Is that okay?

name: Jonathan
line: Yeah. Yeah, of course.

name: Joyce
line: You were here for the money! The money! Admit it! You aren't here 'cause of Will. You never cared about him. You never did! I can't believe I fell for this.

name: Lonnie
line: No! Jesus, Joyce, it was his funeral today. Do we have to do this right now? I'm here to help, Joyce. We could use that money for good.

name: Joyce
line: To help? Oh, like maybe to pay off your debts? To pay for Jonathan to go to school! Lie to me! Yeah, well, where does he wanna go? NYU, Lonnie! He's wanted to go to NYU since he was six years old!

name: Lonnie
line: I'm not lying to you! What? We get that money, anywhere he damn well pleases! So then he goes to NYU!

name: Joyce
line: Get out. Get out! Oh, brother, I have not needed you for a long time!

name: Lonnie
line: You need me here, Joyce. Oh, no? Look what happened.

name: Joyce
line: Oh, don't you dare. At least I was here! Just look around at this place. All your Christmas lights. What the hell am I supposed to think? You're such a great mom? You're a mess! Maybe I am a mess. Maybe I'm crazy. Maybe I'm out of my mind! But, God help me, I will keep these lights up until the day I die if I think there's a chance that Will's still out there! Now, get out! Get out of my house!

name: Nancy
line: You're supposed to hit the cans, right?

name: Jonathan
line: No, actually, you see the spaces in between the cans? I'm aiming for those.

name: Nancy
line: Ah. You ever shot a gun before?

name: Jonathan
line: Yeah, I haven't shot one since I was ten. My dad took me hunting on my birthday. He made me kill a rabbit.

name: Nancy
line: A rabbit?

name: Jonathan
line: Yeah. I guess he thought it would make me into more of a man or something. I cried for a week.

name: Nancy
line: Jesus. Screw that.

name: Jonathan
line: What? I'm a fan of Thumper. Yeah. I guess he and my mother loved each other at some point, but... I wasn't around for that part.

name: Nancy
line: I meant your dad. I don't think my parents ever loved each other. They must've married for some reason. My mom was young. My dad was older, but he had a cushy job, money, came from a good family. So they bought a nice house at the end of the cul-de-sac... and started their nuclear family.

name: Jonathan
line: Screw that.

name: Nancy
line: Yeah. Screw that. Just, uh, point and shoot.

name: Hopper
line: Hey. Jim? I know, I know, I know. I just wanted to... I just wanted to hear your voice and, uh... I just wanted to say that, um... even after everything that happened, I don't... I don't regret any of it. And those seven years, they were... everything to me.

name: Woman
line: Why are you calling me here? I told you not to call me. Have you been drinking?

name: Hopper
line: No. No. You know what, actually, I have been drinking, I'm sorry.

name: Woman
line: Jim, I can't... Just take care of yourself, okay?

name: Hopper
line: Say hi to Bill for me. Are you sure...

name: Dustin
line: How much further? You really need to learn more about compasses.

name: Lucas
line: I don't know. These only tell direction, not distance.

name: Dustin
line: I'm just saying. Uh, I think a portal to another dimension is gonna be pretty obvious.

name: Lucas
line: How do we know when we get to the gate?

name: Dustin
line: Do you think she's acting weird?

name: Lucas
line: You're asking if the weirdo is acting weird? I mean, weirder than normal?

name: Dustin
line: I don't know. Who cares?

name: Dr. Brenner
line: How far, Papa?

name: Eleven
line: Farther than we've ever gone before.

name: Dr. Brenner
line: The bath? Yes.

name: Eleven
line: Yes, the bath. Okay.

name: Mike
line: Mike. Yeah? Look, I'm sure we're almost there. Just hold on a little longer, okay?

name: Eleven
line: Turn back. I'm tired.

name: Nancy
line: You never said what I was saying.

name: Jonathan
line: What?

name: Nancy
line: Yesterday. You said I was saying something and that's why you took my picture.

name: Jonathan
line: Oh, uh... I don't know. My guess... I saw this girl, you know, trying to be someone else. But for that moment... it was like you were alone, or you thought you were. And, you know, you could just be yourself.

name: Nancy
line: That is such bullshit. I am not trying to be someone else. Just because I'm dating Steve and you don't like him... He's actually a good guy. Yesterday, with the camera... He's not like that at all. He was just being protective.

name: Jonathan
line: Yeah, that's one word for it. Okay. No, I... I never said that.

name: Nancy
line: You know what? Forget it. I just thought it was a good picture. Oh, and I guess what you did was okay? He had every right to be pissed...

name: Jonathan
line: Okay, all right. Does that mean I have to like him? Listen, don't take it so personally, okay? I don't like most people. He's in the vast majority.

name: Nancy
line: You know, I was actually starting to think that you were okay. Yeah, I was thinking, 'Jonathan Byers, maybe he's not the pretentious creep everyone says he is.'

name: Jonathan
line: Well, I was just starting to think you were okay. I was thinking, 'Nancy Wheeler, she's not just another suburban girl who thinks she's rebelling by doing exactly what every other suburban girl does... until that phase passes and they marry some boring one-time jock who now works sales, and they live out a perfectly boring little life at the end of a cul-de-sac. Exactly like their parents, who they thought were so depressing, but now, hey, they get it.'

name: Joyce
line: Go away, Lonnie. Seriously! I am gonna murd... What? What?

name: Hopper
line: What the hell is going on, Hopper? Okay. Should be okay, I mean... I can't guarantee it, but it should be okay.

name: Joyce
line: They bugged my place.

name: Hopper
line: They bugged my place. They put a microphone in the light. It's because I'm on to them and they know it. I thought they might be watching you, too. I don't know, the CIA, the NSA, Department of Energy... I don't know.

name: Joyce
line: You gotta explain this to me, 'cause I am not...

name: Hopper
line: I went to the morgue last night, Joyce. It wasn't him. Will's body, it was a fake. You were right. This whole time, you were right.

name: Lucas
line: What did I tell you? She's been playing us from the beginning! Find Will? Find Will? Where is he, then? Huh? I don't see him. No, I actually don't. Just think about it, Mike. She could've just told us where the Upside Down was right away, but she didn't. She just made us run around like headless chickens. No! She used us, all of us! She helped just enough so she could get what she wants. Food and a bed. She's like a stray dog.

name: Mike
line: That's not true. She helped us find Will! Yeah, you know what I mean. All right, calm down! Screw you, Lucas!

name: Lucas
line: No! Screw you, Mike. You're blind... blind because you like that a girl's not grossed out by you. But wake up, man! Wake the hell up! She knows where Will is, and now she's just letting him die in the Upside Down. For all we know, it's her fault. We're looking for some stupid monster... but did you ever stop to think that maybe she's the monster?

name: Mike
line: Shut up! I said shut up! Lucas, what are you doing? Lucas, come on, seriously, just leave her alone!

name: Lucas
line: You did it, didn't you? You don't want us to reach the gate. You don't want us to find Will. Admit it. Admit it!

name: Mike
line: Bull! That's old blood. Right, El? Right, El?

name: Eleven
line: It's... not... it's not safe.

name: Mike
line: Lucas! Lucas! Lucas, are you all right? Lucas. Lucas, come on! Why would you do that? What's wrong with you?

name: Dustin
line: Knock it off, you idiots. Mike, get off! Come on, wake up. Come on! Lucas... Lucas, how many fingers am I holding up? Lucas, how many fingers? Come on, Lucas!

name: Mike
line: Lucas. Lucas, you okay? Just... Lucas. Lucas, let me see.

name: Lucas
line: Get off of me! Get off of me!

name: Dustin
line: Let him go. Man, let him go.

name: Mike
line: Where is El? El? El! Eleven! Eleven!

name: Dustin
line: Eleven! El!

name: Nancy
line: What, are you tired?

name: Jonathan
line: Shut up.

name: Nancy
line: What?

name: Jonathan
line: I heard something.

name: Nancy
line: Oh, God. It's been hit by a car. We can't just leave it.

name: Jonathan
line: I'll do it. I'm not nine anymore.

name: Nancy
line: What was that? Where'd it go? Do you see any more blood?

name: Jonathan
line: I don't know. No.

name: Jonathan
line: Nancy? Nancy? Nancy, where are you? Nancy! Nancy!
